text: Brace yourself, Bravo fans, because you're about to be graced with the most glorious mashup series you've been waiting for. Real Housewives of New York's Bethenny Frankel is joining forces with Million Dollar Listing New York's Fredrik Eklund for a new series that puts their love for real estate in the spotlight. Can you even contain your excitement? Because we sure can't! If you're a true Bravo devotee, you're probably well aware this isn't the first time Frankel and Eklund have worked together, as the real estate agent notably helped the RHONY star sell the luxurious Tribeca apartment she formerly shared with her ex, Jason Hoppy. But it wasn't just any ol'real estate
